item.description:
I recently did a workshop for women only called "How To Be More Desirable On A Date", and it was a big hit.  The ladies asked for another workshop where we would spend the whole class practicing the touching techniques we learned.  This is that class :)

And the good news is, you do not have to have taken the previous class in order to take this one.  I'll go over each of the touching techniques and then we'll do a safe and appropriate exercise where you can practice what you just learned with a partner.

IMPORTANT:  Ladies, it's important to me that you feel safe during this class, and so rest assured that the only men that will be in this class are the ones that I hand pick and invite personally.  There will be men for you to practice on, and you'll also be able to practice with the other women if that feels safer.

************************************************* 
HERE'S A SMALL SAMPLE OF WHAT YOU'LL LEARN: 
*************************************************

  • A simple "backwards leading" trick that compels men to make a move on you, even if they were nervous or hesitant before.  If he's having trouble taking the next step, this will solve the problem immediately, and he will be grateful for it.
  • The one missing ingredient that instantly makes ALL of your touches more exciting.  You will stand out above all other women if you do this.
  • The three kinds of touch that are only taught to professional massage therapists, and how to use them to create an instant physical response that makes him want to get closer to you.
  • How to 'texturize your touch', and make him desire you even more.
  • How to effortlessly compel him to make that all important first kiss without seeming pushy or overly eager.
  • A simple secret I learned from a female mall employee that instantly makes your hugs and kisses more stimulating and memorable.  Want to leave a strong impression?  Make this one small change to what you're already doing and watch how he responds!
  • And much more!

*************************************************  
HOW TO GET INVOLVED  
*************************************************

Where is it?  This event is going to be at my home in Lower Allston, right near Harvard Business School. It's very easy to get to both by car and public transportation, and there's plenty of on-street parking. Directions will be emailed to you. We will start the event promptly at 7:00pm and run until 9:00pm. Please plan on arriving by 6:45 so you have time to settle in and meet the other guests. You never know who you'll meet that can become a new friend and add a lot of value to your life.

How much?  Cheap.  If you took a class like this through an adult education center, you'd easily pay more than $50 to attend, and that's assuming there even  is a class that could offer you this kind of knowledge, which there isn't.  This is the PG13-Rated stuff that most dating teachers would be scared to teach you, but I am committed to helping you improve your dating life, and this is a very important piece to get handled.

So how much?  Because I want to help as many women as I can, I've decided to keep the price very affordable so that anyone who wants to come will be able to.  The cost for this event is only $25, which is very low considering the quality of training that you'll be getting.

Think about it...  that's 83 cents a day for a month.  What else do you spend 83 cents on every day that makes no difference in your social life (or love life) whatsoever? I promise that this will be well worth your time.

How big is the class?  Because this is class is being held at my house and not a large seminar room, I have to limit the size to only 8 women.  There are over 800 other people seeing this message, so be sure to put in your RSVP right now in order to lock in your spot.

Please remember to bring:

  • $25 cash
  • A pen
  • A great attitude
  • And a willingness to learn fun, new things.

Go ahead and put in your RSVP right now in order to secure your spot.  I'm looking forward to seeing you there.

Warmly,  
Jason

P.S. - Take down my cell number in case you have any questions about the event or if you get lost. The venue is extremely easy to find, so you should have no problems, but just in case, my cell is: 617-901-8871.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email you directions. My house is easy to find.
item.name: *FOR WOMEN ONLY* - How To Ignite A Man's Desire For You
